level.text: This chapter applies to applicants for and holders of a registration to practice as a dental assistant.
Chapters 40 (Health Occupations: General Rules) and 41 (Health Occupations Administrative Procedures) of Title 17 of the District of Columbia Municipal Regulations supplement this chapter.

level.heading: SOURCE
level.text: Notice of Final Rulemaking published at 58 DCR 5852 (July 15, 2011); as amended by Final Rulemaking published at 60 DCR 10055 (July 12, 2013).
